html: (2 Nephi 19:19)."The people shall be as the fuel of the fire: no man shall spare his brother." Humans will become so coldhearted and bloodthirsty that the sanctity of life will no longer be a dearly held standard of society. People's lives will be dispatched with the same rapidity with which fire consumes fuel. This is truly a sign of "the love of men … wax[ing] cold." (JS M 1:30; BICQ, 79-82, 90.)
